    • Expedite Poisson-NMF estimation via single-effect regression

    Predict NMF loading -- this may be slow for high-dim data

    asap_predict_mtx.Rd

    Predict NMF loading -- this may be slow for high-dim data

    asap_predict_mtx(
  mtx_file,
  memory_location,
  beta_dict,
  do_beta_rescale = TRUE,
  collapsing = NULL,
  mcem = 100L,
  burnin = 10L,
  latent_iter = 10L,
  thining = 3L,
  a0 = 1,
  b0 = 1,
  rseed = 42L,
  verbose = FALSE,
  NUM_THREADS = 1L,
  BLOCK_SIZE = 100L,
  gibbs_sampling = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    mtx_file

    matrix-market-formatted data file (bgzip)

    memory_location

    column indexing for the mtx

    beta_dict

    row x factor dictionary (beta) matrix

    do_beta_rescale

    rescale the columns of the beta matrix

    collapsing

    r x row collapsing matrix (r < row)

    mcem

    number of Monte Carlo Expectation Maximization

    burnin

    burn-in period

    latent_iter

    latent sampling steps

    thining

    thining interval in record keeping

    a0

    gamma(a0, b0)

    b0

    gamma(a0, b0)

    rseed

    random seed

    verbose

    verbosity

    NUM_THREADS

    number of threads in data reading

    BLOCK_SIZE

    disk I/O block size (number of columns)

    Contents

    Developed by Yongjin Park, Sishir Subedi.
